nodes.text: Sarel Corro was a male Human member of the Balmorran resistance living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was part of a cell led by Zenith that rescued the President of Balmorra Retheus Galthe from Darth Lachris. Unfortunately, prolonged torture by broke Galthe's mind and a Balmorra citizens committee was assembled by Sarel Corro and other Balmorrans to oversee the transfer of political power to Tai Cordan.
Sarel Corro appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Consular class mission on Balmorra.
